statements: SELECT * FROM ClientDetails WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM ClientDetails WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM ClientDetails WHERE client_email = 'john@example.com';
SELECT client_phone, client_name FROM ClientDetails WHERE client_id = 3;
SELECT client_id, client_name, client_phone FROM ClientDetails WHERE client_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT client_id, client_name, client_email, client_phone FROM ClientDetails WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ClientDetails WHERE client_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM ClientDetails ORDER BY client_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_clients FROM ClientDetails;
SELECT client_name, UPPER(client_email) AS email FROM ClientDetails WHERE client_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM ClientDetails;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM ClientDetails WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, client_phone, client_address FROM ClientDetails WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM ProjectRequirements WHERE project_status = 'Active';
SELECT project_name, project_deadline FROM ProjectRequirements ORDER BY project_deadline DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM ClientDetails WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ClientDetails ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_phone, client_address FROM ClientDetails WHERE client_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT project_name, project_deadline, project_status FROM ProjectRequirements WHERE project_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM ProjectRequirements ORDER BY project_deadline ASC, project_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, contact_person FROM clients ORDER BY contact_person ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT client_name, count(*) AS project_count FROM clients JOIN projects ON clients.client_id = projects.client_id GROUP BY client_name;
SELECT client_name, project_name, requirement_details FROM clients JOIN projects ON clients.client_id = projects.client_id JOIN requirements ON projects.project_id = requirements.project_id;
SELECT client_name, contact_email FROM clients WHERE client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT requirement_details FROM requirements WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM clients JOIN projects ON clients.client_id = projects.client_id;
SELECT client_name, project_name FROM clients JOIN projects ON clients.client_id = projects.client_id;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM project_assignments ORDER BY assignment_date DESC;
SELECT architect_name, architect_email FROM architects WHERE architect_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_id > 5 ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_status = 'Active' ORDER BY project_name;
SELECT architect_name, architect_email FROM architects WHERE architect_phone LIKE '123%' AND architect_email IS NOT NULL;

SELECT clients.client_name, projects.project_name, project_assignments.assignment_date FROM clients JOIN project_assignments ON clients.client_id = project_assignments.project_id JOIN projects ON project_assignments.project_id = projects.project_id WHERE project_assignments.assignment_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY clients.client_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 5;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT client_name, project_name, requirement_description FROM clients c INNER JOIN projects p ON c.client_id = p.client_id INNER JOIN project_requirements pr ON p.project_id = pr.project_id WHERE pr.requirement_id = 3;
SELECT team_name, employee_name FROM project_team pt INNER JOIN employees e ON pt.team_lead = e.employee_id WHERE pt.project_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM clients ORDER BY client_name DESC, client_id
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_phone LIKE '%555%'
SELECT team_name, employee_name FROM project_team INNER JOIN employees ON project_team.team_lead = employees.employee_id
SELECT project_name, requirement_description FROM projects LEFT JOIN project_requirements ON projects.project_id = project_requirements.project_id
